info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HARRISON... JEFFERSON...COLUMBIANA...SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL...BROOKE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 721 PM EDT, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Salem to 7 miles northeast of Cadiz. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Weirton, Steubenville, Salem, East Liverpool, Columbiana, East Palestine, Wellsville, Cadiz, Toronto, Calcutta, Wintersville, and Mingo Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Ohio...western Pennsylvania...and northern West Virginia.
